main event: An observer reported seeing a bright green light falling almost straight down from the sky at Los Alamos, New Mexico on 3 March 1949.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 0159 hours and the observer was sitting in a chair facing East., The only object observed was one bright green light., The light was self-luminous and maintained brightness during the observation., The direction of the object's flight was straight down towards the ground., There were broken clouds at 25,000 feet during the sighting.
